adDetails: If it's dirty, we clean it! Our supplies or yours! WE ACCEPT LAST MINUTE CALLS/ APPOINTMENTS WHAT OUR SERVICE INCLUDES: *~Kitchen~* Sinks and counters scrubbed and disinfected Clean all countertop appliances Wash down outside cabinets and drawers Clean refrigerator exterior Clean outside, top and front of range Wipe down outside and inside of microwave Clean table and chairs Empty and wash out trashcan Sweep and wash the floor *~Bathrooms~* Tile walls, shower and shower doors cleaned and disinfected Sinks and counters scrubbed and disinfected Toilets scrubbed and disinfected Wipe down outside and inside cabinets and drawers Empty and wash out trashcan Sweep and wash the floor CALL FOR FREE ESTIMATE: CELL show contact info or show contact info
